verses.verse: Now when Jacob <S%H3290><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was <S%H3426><s%> corn <S%H7668><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his sons <S%H1121><s%>, Why do you look one upon another <S%H7200><s%>?

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H8085><s%>, I have heard that there is <S%H3426><s%> corn <S%H7668><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: get you down <S%H3381><s%> there and buy <S%H7666><s%> for us from there that we may live <S%H2421><s%>, and not die <S%H4191><s%>.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s ten <S%H6235><s%> brothers <S%H251><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> corn <S%H1250><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

But Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>, Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> not with his brothers <S%H251><s%>; for he said <S%H559><s%>, What if <S%H6435><s%> mischief <S%H611><s%> happen to him <S%H7122><s%>?

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> corn among <S%H8432><s%> those that came <S%H935><s%>: for the famine <S%H7458><s%> was in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was the governor <S%H7989><s%> over the land <S%H776><s%>, and he it was that sold <S%H7666><s%> to all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: and Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s brothers <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, and bowed down <S%H7812><s%> themselves before him with their faces <S%H639><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%>, and he knew <S%H5234><s%> them <S%H5234><s%>, but made himself strange unto them <S%H1696><s%>, and spoke roughly <S%H7186><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>; and he said unto them <S%H370><s%>, from where come <S%H935><s%> you <S%H559><s%>? And they said, From the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food <S%H400><s%>.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> knew <S%H5234><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%>, but they knew not him <S%H5234><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> the dreams <S%H2472><s%> which he dreamed <S%H2492><s%> of them <S%H559><s%>, and said unto them <S%H7270><s%>, you are spies; to see <S%H7200><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> you are come <S%H935><s%>.
And they said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H113><s%>, No my lord, but to buy <S%H7666><s%> food <S%H400><s%> are your servants <S%H5650><s%> come <S%H935><s%>.
We <S%H5168><s%> are all one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>; we are honest <S%H3651><s%> men <S%H5650><s%>, your servants are no spies <S%H7270><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7200><s%>, No but to see the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> you are come <S%H935><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%>, Your servants <S%H5650><s%> are twelve <S%H8147><s%> brothers <S%H251><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>; and <S%H6996><s%>, behold, the youngest is this day <S%H3117><s%> with our father <S%H1><s%>, and one is not <S%H259><s%>.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H1696><s%>, That is it that I spoke unto you <S%H559><s%>, saying, you are spies <S%H7270><s%>:

By this <S%H2063><s%> you shall be proved <S%H974><s%>: By the life <S%H2416><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> you shall not go forth <S%H3318><s%> from here <S%H6996><s%>, except your youngest brother <S%H251><s%> come here <S%H935><s%>

Send <S%H7971><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of you <S%H3947><s%>, and let him fetch your brother <S%H251><s%>, and you shall be kept in prison <S%H631><s%>, that your words <S%H1697><s%> may be proved <S%H974><s%>, whether there be any truth <S%H571><s%> in <S%H854><s%> you <S%H3808><s%>: or else by the life <S%H2416><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> surely you are spies <S%H7270><s%>.
And he put them all together <S%H622><s%> into custody <S%H4929><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, This do <S%H6213><s%>, and live <S%H2421><s%>; for I fear <S%H3373><s%> God <S%H430><s%>:

If you be honest <S%H3651><s%> men <S%H259><s%>, let one of your brothers <S%H251><s%> be bound <S%H631><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of your prison <S%H4929><s%>: go <S%H3212><s%> you carry <S%H935><s%> corn <S%H7668><s%> for the famine <S%H7459><s%> of your houses <S%H1004><s%>:

But bring <S%H935><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> unto me <S%H1697><s%>; so shall your words be verified <S%H539><s%>, and you shall not die <S%H4191><s%>. And they did so <S%H6213><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, We are truly <S%H61><s%> guilty <S%H818><s%> concerning our brother <S%H251><s%>, in that <S%H834><s%> we saw <S%H7200><s%> the anguish <S%H6869><s%> of his soul <S%H5315><s%>, when he begged <S%H2603><s%> us <S%H8085><s%>, and we would not hear; therefore is this distress <S%H6869><s%> come upon us <S%H935><s%>.

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, saying, spoke I <S%H559><s%> not unto you <S%H559><s%>, saying, Do not sin <S%H2398><s%> against the child <S%H3206><s%>; and you would not hear <S%H8085><s%>? therefore <S%H1818><s%>, behold, also his blood is required <S%H1875><s%>.
And they knew <S%H3045><s%> not that Joseph <S%H3130><s%> understood <S%H8085><s%> them <S%H3887><s%>; for he spoke unto them by an interpreter.

And he turned himself away <S%H5437><s%> from them <S%H1058><s%>, and wept; and returned to them again <S%H7725><s%>, and talked <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H3947><s%>, and took from them Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, and bound <S%H631><s%> him before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to fill <S%H4390><s%> their sacks <S%H3627><s%> with corn <S%H1250><s%>, and to restore <S%H7725><s%> every man <S%H376><s%>'s money <S%H3701><s%> into his sack <S%H8242><s%>, and to give <S%H5414><s%> them provision <S%H6720><s%> for the way <S%H1870><s%>: and thus <S%H3651><s%> did he unto them <S%H6213><s%>.
And they loaded <S%H5375><s%> their donkeys <S%H2543><s%> with the corn <S%H7668><s%>, and departed there <S%H3212><s%>

And as one <S%H259><s%> of them opened <S%H6605><s%> his sack <S%H8242><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> his donkey <S%H2543><s%> food <S%H4554><s%> in the inn <S%H4411><s%>, he saw <S%H7200><s%> his money <S%H3701><s%>; for <S%H572><s%>, behold, it was in his sack's mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto his brothers <S%H251><s%>, My money <S%H3701><s%> is restored <S%H7725><s%>; and <S%H2009><s%>, behold, it is even in my sack <S%H572><s%>: and their heart <S%H3820><s%> failed <S%H3318><s%> them <S%H2729><s%>, and they were afraid, saying <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, What is this that God <S%H430><s%> has done unto us <S%H6213><s%>?

And they came <S%H935><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> him all that happened <S%H7136><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>; saying,

The man <S%H376><s%>, who is the lord <S%H113><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, spoke <S%H1696><s%> roughly <S%H7186><s%> to us <S%H5414><s%>, and took us for spies <S%H7270><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%>.
And we said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3651><s%>, We are honest men <S%H7270><s%>; we are no spies:

We are twelve <S%H6240><s%> brothers <S%H251><s%>, sons <S%H1121><s%> of our father <S%H1><s%>; one <S%H259><s%> is not <S%H6996><s%>, and the youngest is this day <S%H3117><s%> with our father <S%H1><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%>, the lord <S%H113><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%>, said <S%H559><s%> unto us <S%H3045><s%>, By this shall I know that you are honest <S%H3651><s%> men <S%H3240><s%>; leave one <S%H259><s%> of your brothers <S%H251><s%> here with me <S%H3947><s%>, and take food for the famine <S%H7459><s%> of your households <S%H1004><s%>, and be gone <S%H3212><s%>:

And bring <S%H935><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> unto me <S%H3045><s%>: then shall I know that you are no spies <S%H7270><s%>, but that you are honest <S%H3651><s%> men <S%H5414><s%>: so will I deliver you your brother <S%H251><s%>, and you shall traffic <S%H5503><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

And it came to pass as they emptied <S%H7324><s%> their sacks <S%H8242><s%>, that <S%H376><s%>, behold, every man's bundle <S%H6872><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%> was in his sack <S%H8242><s%>: and when both they and their father <S%H1><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the bundles <S%H6872><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%>, they were afraid <S%H3372><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7921><s%>, Me have you bereaved of my sons Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is not <S%H8095><s%>, and Simeon is not <S%H3947><s%>, and you will take Benjamin away <S%H1144><s%>: all these things are against me.

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, kill <S%H4191><s%> my two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, if I bring <S%H935><s%> him not to you deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into my hand <S%H3027><s%>, and I will bring him to you again <S%H7725><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, My son <S%H1121><s%> shall not go down <S%H3381><s%> with you <S%H251><s%>; for his brother is dead <S%H4191><s%>, and he is left <S%H7604><s%> alone <S%H611><s%>: if mischief happens to <S%H7122><s%> him by the way <S%H1870><s%> in the which you go <S%H3212><s%>, then shall you bring down <S%H3381><s%> my gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> with sorrow <S%H3015><s%> to the grave <S%H7585><s%>.
